title: Deep elf conjurer
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a list of all deep elves, see [list of deep elves](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves").*

| deep elf conjurer e [![Deep elf conjurer.png](/images/e/ea/Deep_elf_conjurer.png)](/File:Deep_elf_conjurer.png) |                                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                                  | 27-54                                                                  |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                                      | 9                                                                      |

| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                                        | 12                                                                     |
| [MR](/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")                                                                      | 80                                                                     |
| Attack1                                                                                                         | 5 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"))                                  |
| [Max Chunks](/Corpse "Corpse")                                                                                  | 4                                                                      |

|   |                                                            |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A deep elf well-versed in a variety of destructive magics. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Deep elf conjurers** are fragile [deep elf](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves") [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") specialists which blast you with dangerous and irritating attack spells. They often appear in packs with other deep elves in the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls") and sometimes in [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults"), they are also featured in some [baileys](/Bailey "Bailey").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                 |                                                     |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") (3d17)             | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold") (3d17)             | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") (3d16)       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") (3d17) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

It's hard to prepare for everything they can hit you with. [Fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"), [cold resistance](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"), [life protection](/Life_protection "Life protection")... It's a lot to muster. Alternatively, you can just [silence](/Silence "Silence") them, rendering them nearly harmless, or kill them at range. Like most deep elves, they're very fragile; two to three zaps from a [wand of cold](/Wand_of_cold "Wand of cold") or [wand of fire](/Wand_of_fire "Wand of fire") can take out multiple if you line them up first.

## History

Deep elf conjurers were removed in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").

Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") they had a second spell set, one which included such annoyances as [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame"). They also had less HD.
html:
Deep elf conjurer

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all deep elves, see list of deep elves.

deep elf conjurer e

 

HP 27-54
HD 9
XP 603
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 12
MR 80
Attack1 5 (hit)


Max Chunks 4
Type of Meat Clean
Resistances None
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type elf, elf
Flags Evil
A deep elf well-versed in a variety of destructive magics.


Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Deep elf conjurers are fragile deep elf Conjurations specialists which blast you with dangerous and irritating attack spells. They often appear in packs with other deep elves in the Elven Halls and sometimes in the Vaults, they are also featured in some baileys.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Fire (3d17) Wizard flag
Slot2 Bolt of Cold (3d17) Wizard flag
Slot3 Lightning Bolt (3d16) Wizard flag
Slot4 Bolt of Draining (3d17) Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

It's hard to prepare for everything they can hit you with. Fire resistance, cold resistance, life protection... It's a lot to muster. Alternatively, you can just silence them, rendering them nearly harmless, or kill them at range. Like most deep elves, they're very fragile; two to three zaps from a wand of cold or wand of fire can take out multiple if you line them up first.

History

Deep elf conjurers were removed in 0.18.

Prior to 0.13 they had a second spell set, one which included such annoyances as Sticky Flame. They also had less HD.

==Tips & Tricks== It's hard to prepare for everything they can hit you with. [[Fire resistance]], [[cold resistance]], [[life protection]]... It's a lot to muster. Alternatively, you can just [[silence]] them, rendering them nearly harmless, or kill them at range. Like most deep elves, they're very fragile; two to three zaps from a [[wand of cold]] or [[wand of fire]] can take out multiple if you line them up first. ==History== Deep elf conjurers were removed in [[0.18]]. Prior to [[0.13]] they had a second spell set, one which included such annoyances as [[Sticky Flame]]. They also had less HD. [[category:Elf]]
